email_text:
Subject: Your Amazon Order Confirmation (#123456789)

Dear [Customer],

Thank you for shopping with Amazon! We are pleased to confirm that your recent order has been successfully processed. Please find the details of your purchase below:

Order Number: #123456789
Order Date: May 15, 2022

Shipping Address:
Jane Doe
123 Main Street
Anytown, USA

Payment Method: Visa ending in 1234

Order Details:
1. Product: Amazon Basics 4-Slice Toaster
   Price: $39.99

2. Product: Amazon Smart Plug
   Price: $24.99

3. Product: Samsung 32-Inch Smart TV
   Price: $249.99

Subtotal: $314.97
Shipping: FREE
Total: $314.97

Your order is scheduled to be delivered on May 20, 2022. You can track the status of your shipment by visiting the "Your Orders" section of your Amazon account.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your order, please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Service team at 1-888-123-4567.

Thank you for choosing Amazon. We appreciate your business!

Sincerely,

Amazon Customer Service Team
